title: PBE
body:
I've applied for a PBE account many times and have never been accepted. I recently made a youtube account, currently sitting on about 160 subs, and am wanting to do videos of new skin reviews, items and even gameplay of URF and stuff. If someone could give me their unused PBE account or something, I would be very grateful. Thanks for reading.

-MrKillerKow

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll just have to wait it out like the majority of players who apply for PBE access.

Having someone "Give you an unused PBE account" is against the TOS as it is considered account sharing and is bannable.
